data.text: @paul_nesbitt Yes—five days from start of symptoms, so we can come out of lockdown on Friday/Saturday. However, we then go straight into March Break.
@TaniaFreedman Sense of humour will help.  But not easy.  I think most recent advice allows you out pretty early?
@TaniaFreedman Oh no, major Thunderdome vibes there! https://t.co/VJWOrvQxQa
@TheDevilHistory Thanks. Hope it continues to be a mild case, but locking a pubescent teen in a house with a peri-menopausal woman means one of us may kill the other before it’s over. 😂
@TaniaFreedman Oh no, I'm so sorry, Tania.
